meanings.sent1: She danced youthfully at the party.
meanings.sent2: He skipped youthfully down the street.
meanings.sent3: The puppy chased its tail youthfully.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustled youthfully in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The children played youthfully in the park.

meanings.definition: With the characteristics or qualities of youth
meanings.sent1: Her youthfully glowing skin impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The youthfully energetic team won the game.
meanings.sent3: The old cat tried to act youthfully by chasing a toy.
meanings.sent4: The youthfully painted walls brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The youthfully optimistic outlook inspired others.
